name: CFMoto 150SC

meta_description: Ride in style with the CFMoto 150SC: liquid-cooled maxi-scooter, TFT display, ABS & 40 kmpl mileage in Bangladesh.
short_description: CFMoto 150SC - A sporty 149.3cc maxi-scooter with aggressive styling, comfortable ergonomics, and peppy performance for urban commuting.

faqs.question: Does it have ABS?
faqs.answer: Yes, it comes with single-channel ABS on the front wheel.

faqs.question: What's the storage capacity?
faqs.answer: It offers 25L under-seat storage - enough for a full-face helmet.

faqs.question: Is it suitable for highway riding?
faqs.answer: Can cruise comfortably at 80-90 kmph but limited by small wheels for extended highway use.

faqs.question: Does it have a charging port?
faqs.answer: Yes, it comes with a USB charging port.

name: CFMoto 250NK
meta_title: CFMoto 250NK Naked Bike – 26.5 PS Streetfighter
meta_description: Lightweight 250cc naked bike with LED lighting, 135 km/h top speed & beginner-friendly handling. Best in class!
short_description: CFMoto 250NK - A 249cc naked streetfighter with aggressive styling, lightweight chassis, and sporty performance for urban riding.

faqs.question: Does it have ABS?
faqs.answer: Yes, it comes with single-channel ABS as standard.

faqs.question: Is it suitable for beginners?
faqs.answer: Yes, its manageable power and lightweight make it a good beginner bike.

faqs.question: What's the service interval?
faqs.answer: Recommended service every 5,000 km or 6 months.

faqs.question: Does it have a slipper clutch?
faqs.answer: No, it comes with a standard wet multi-plate clutch.

name: CFMoto 125 NK
meta_title: CFMoto 125 NK – Premium 6-Speed Liquid-Cooled Naked
meta_description: Stylish 125cc beginner bike with 6-speed gearbox, liquid cooling & digital LCD—perfect for city commuting in BD.
short_description: CFMoto 125 NK is a stylish and well-built entry-level naked street bike that offers sharp handling, modern design, and premium features for new riders.
pros: Great beginner bike with stable handling
cons: Not the most fuel efficient in class

faqs.question: Is the CFMoto 125 NK good for beginners?
faqs.answer: Yes, it’s lightweight, easy to handle, and perfect for new riders.

faqs.question: Does the 125 NK have ABS?
faqs.answer: No, it does not come with ABS, but it has disc brakes at both ends.

faqs.question: What is the real-world mileage?
faqs.answer: You can expect 34–38 kmpl depending on your riding style.

faqs.question: Can I use it for daily commuting?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Its upright posture and smooth engine make it great for daily use.

name: CFMoto 300 NK
meta_title: CFMoto 300 NK – Dual-Channel ABS 300cc Streetfighter
meta_description: Aggressive 300cc naked with slipper clutch, TFT display & dual ABS—Bangladesh’s best-value performance bike.
short_description: CFMoto 300 NK is a sharp and aggressive 300cc naked streetfighter that offers excellent value with premium features, liquid-cooled engine, and modern styling.
braking: Front Disc, Rear Disc with Dual-Channel ABS

faqs.question: Does the CFMoto 300 NK come with ABS?
faqs.answer: Yes, it features dual-channel ABS as standard for safety.

faqs.question: Is the 300 NK comfortable for daily commuting?
faqs.answer: It’s good for short to medium commutes, but the seat is a bit stiff for long rides.

faqs.question: What type of display does it have?
faqs.answer: It comes with a full-color TFT display with ride stats and indicators.

faqs.question: Is it a good bike for beginners?
faqs.answer: It’s suitable for confident beginners due to its power and handling, though new riders should be cautious.

name: CFMoto 250SR
meta_title: CFMoto 250SR – Full-Faired 250cc Sportbike
meta_description: Track-inspired 250SR with full fairing, TFT console & 140 km/h top speed—ideal for sporty riders in Bangladesh.
short_description: CFMoto 250SR - A full-faired 249cc sports bike with aggressive styling, track-inspired ergonomics, and spirited performance.
cons: Aggressive riding position for long rides

faqs.question: Does it have ABS?
faqs.answer: Yes, it comes with single-channel ABS as standard.

faqs.question: Is it suitable for track use?
faqs.answer: While capable, it's primarily designed for street use with some track potential.

faqs.question: What's the difference from 250NK?
faqs.answer: The 250SR has full fairings, more aggressive ergonomics, and slightly more power than the naked 250NK.

faqs.question: Does it have a slipper clutch?
faqs.answer: No, it comes with a standard wet multi-plate clutch.

name: CFMoto 250CL-C
meta_title: CFMoto 250CL-C Cruiser – Low Seat, Big Fuel Tank
meta_description: Classic 250cc cruiser with 690mm seat height, 14L tank & heel-toe shifter—comfort meets retro style in BD.
short_description: CFMoto 250CL-C - A 249cc cruiser motorcycle with classic styling, relaxed ergonomics, and torquey performance for comfortable cruising.

faqs.question: Does it have ABS?
faqs.answer: The base variant comes without ABS, but ABS versions may be available in some markets.

faqs.question: Is it suitable for tall riders?
faqs.answer: The low seat height is better suited for average height riders, though the forward controls help.

faqs.question: What's the service interval?
faqs.answer: Recommended service every 5,000 km or 6 months.

faqs.question: Does it have a heel-toe shifter?
faqs.answer: Yes, it comes with a classic cruiser-style heel-toe shifter.

name: CFMoto 300SR
meta_title: CFMoto 300SR – 30.5 PS Full-Faired Sport Bike
meta_description: 292cc liquid-cooled sportbike with dual ABS, 155 km/h top speed & TFT display—thrills for serious riders.
short_description: CFMoto 300SR - A 292cc full-faired sportbike with aggressive styling, track-inspired ergonomics, and spirited performance for enthusiasts.

faqs.question: Does it have ABS?
faqs.answer: Yes, it comes with dual-channel ABS as standard.

faqs.question: Is it suitable for beginners?
faqs.answer: While manageable, the aggressive ergonomics and power may be challenging for complete beginners.

faqs.question: What's the difference from 250SR?
faqs.answer: The 300SR has a larger 292cc engine, more power, and premium features like TFT display.

faqs.question: Does it have a slipper clutch?
faqs.answer: No, it comes with a standard wet multi-plate clutch.

name: KPV 150 RACE
meta_title: Lifan KPV 150 RACE – Adventure Scooter w/ 180mm Clearance
meta_description: Rugged 150cc adventure scooter with 180mm ground clearance, 11L tank & LED DRLs—urban explorer’s dream.
short_description: KPV 150 RACE is a premium adventure-style scooter offering rugged looks, advanced features, and the versatility to handle both urban and off-road riding.
build_quality: Rugged, adventure-ready scooter with high ground clearance and sporty build
cons: Not ideal for very short riders

faqs.question: Is KPV 150 RACE good for off-road use?
faqs.answer: Yes, it features high ground clearance and dual-purpose tires for light off-road rides.

faqs.question: Does it have LED lights?
faqs.answer: Yes, both headlight and tail light are LED with DRLs included.

faqs.question: Is this scooter fuel efficient?
faqs.answer: Yes, it delivers around 40–45 kmpl in real-world riding.

faqs.question: What is the fuel tank capacity?
faqs.answer: It comes with an 11-liter fuel tank, larger than most scooters.
